name: Space Shooter (itch)
description:
Early prototype!

**Best played on Android. **

Pc Controls: Mouse to move and Right Mouse button to slow down time.

Android Controls: The player moves to your fingers position. Lift your finger to go into slow motion.

Music by DST: www.nosoapradio.us

Remember to give feedback in the comments or on my twitter @sorensaket

REMEMBER TO GIVE FEEDBACK ON THE ITCH.IO FORUM OR ON MY TWITTER @sorensaket
